data.node-disk-manager.config:
probeconfigs:
  - key: udev-probe
    name: udev probe
    state: true
  - key: seachest-probe
    name: seachest probe
    state: false
  - key: smart-probe
    name: smart probe
    state: true
filterconfigs:
  - key: os-disk-exclude-filter
    name: os disk exclude filter
    state: false
    exclude: "/,/etc/hosts,/boot"
  - key: vendor-filter
    name: vendor filter
    state: true
    include: ""
    exclude: "CLOUDBYT,OpenEBS"
  - key: path-filter
    name: path filter
    state: true
    include: ""
    exclude: "/dev/fd0,/dev/sr0,/dev/ram,/dev/dm-,/dev/md,/dev/rbd,/dev/zd"
